branding.tagline: Your patchwork of inspiration and knowledge in quilting!

publishing_focus.primary_focus: Quilting patterns, history, technique guides, and artist profiles.
publishing_focus.target_audience: Quilting enthusiasts, craft historians, art students and professionals.
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our publishing arm is dedicated exclusively to quilting, providing in-depth insights and expertise that general craft publishers can't match.
publishing_focus.example_titles: Unique and traditional quilt patterns, in-depth history of quilting, author types like quilting experts, historians
